snippet: The quick route to rabbit involves pan-searing it in herbs, followed by a brief roast in the oven with wine, lemon, olives and feta.
abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column offers recipe for roasted rabbit with olives and feta.
lead_paragraph: The quick route to rabbit involves pan-searing it in herbs, followed by a brief roast in the oven with wine, lemon, olives and feta.

headline.main: Hop, Skip and a Jump: Rabbit the Easy Way
headline.print_headline: Hop, Skip and a Jump: Rabbit the Easy Way
